medical_history.chief_complaint: 24 hours of rigors and acute nausea with 1 episode of emesis.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented with rigors for 24 hours and acute nausea for ___ days, with intermittent nausea for ___ months preceding this episode. Nausea improved with eating on occasion. The patient also reports a 25 lb weight loss over this time period.
medical_history.past_medical_history: AFib, depression, hyperlipidemia, TIA, BPH, h pylori, GERD.
medical_history.family_history: Brother with multiple strokes; Mother has HTN and HLD.
